primetooler.msg.config_desc_1: Toggle PrimeTooler features and client helpers
primetooler.msg.config_desc_2: on or off. Changes apply immediately
primetooler.msg.chat_desc_1: Quick presets for chat messages to edit and send.
primetooler.msg.chat_desc_2: For frequent texts; max &f&l5&7 slots. &8&o(&f&l25 &8&oas Special member.)
primetooler.msg.special_desc_4: Thanks for the support and testing.
primetooler.msg.tooltip_locked: &7This feature is only usable for &f&lSPECIAL MEMBERS&7. &8-> &7No access to this &f&lsetting&7.
primetooler.msg.tooltip_durability: &7Protects items from breaking at low durability. &8-> &7Blocks use at &f&l10% threshold&7 and shows a warning.
primetooler.msg.tooltip_calc: &7Enables the &f&lInventory Calculator&7 field in the GUI.
primetooler.msg.tooltip_pack: &7Blocks server resource packs on join. &8-> &7Keeps the &f&llocal state&7 and does not start a download.
primetooler.msg.tooltip_slotlock: &7Locks selected inventory slots from moving. &8-> &7Press the &f&lSlot Lock&7 key {KEY} on a slot to toggle; stays active.
primetooler.msg.tooltip_double_drop:
&7Prevents accidental dropping of items.
&f&lALL&7 = All items
&f&lRARE&7 = Custom items only
primetooler.msg.tooltip_sync: &7Shows additional &f&lItem Sync&7 debug info. &8-> &7Writes &f&lclient-only&7 logs to the console.
primetooler.msg.tooltip_autospawn: &7Auto &f&l/plot home&7 at low health. &8-> &7Sends the command below &f&l2.5 hearts&7.
primetooler.msg.tooltip_clantag: &7Removes &f&lClan Tags&7 in tab & nametag. &8-> &7Only active on &f&lmultiplayer servers&7.
primetooler.msg.tooltip_frontcam: &7Disables the &f&lfront camera&7 in F5. &8-> &7Switches only between &f&lfirst person&7 and &f&lback view&7.
primetooler.msg.tooltip_effects: &7Shows/hides effects in inventory. &8-> &7Hides the &f&lpotion effects&7 on the left side.
primetooler.msg.tooltip_hudeffects: &7Shows/hides effects in HUD. &8-> &7Hides active &f&lpotion effects&7 in the overlay.
primetooler.msg.tooltip_jackpot_sound: &7Suppresses the &f&lEnder Dragon growl&7 sound on jackpots.
primetooler.msg.tooltip_warning_sound: &7Adjusts volume for mod warning sounds (drop, durability).
primetooler.msg.tooltip_msg: &7Click to edit; text is saved directly.
primetooler.msg.tooltip_add: &7Adds the message to the list. &8-> &7Max. &f&l5&7 slots. &8&o(&f&l25 &8&oas Special member.)
primetooler.msg.tooltip_add_locked: &7For more you need a &f&lSPECIAL MEMBERSHIP&7. &8-> &7No access to additional &f&lslots&7.
primetooler.msg.tooltip_sendown: &7Shows the message only to you. &8-> &7Ideal for testing &f&lformatting&7.
primetooler.msg.tooltip_special_support: &7Opens the support page in the browser. &8-> &7Thanks for your &f&lsupport&7.
primetooler.msg.checkitem_save_denied: &cItems can only be saved if name, lore or enchantments are present.
